ddress","name":"backendSigner","type":"address"}],"internalType":"struct logbook for AI decisions in the Flint Trust Layer. Stores evidence of AI reasoning, inputs, and context (FTSO/FDC).","kind":"dev","methods":{"logDecision(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,bytes32,uint256,address)":{"details":"No access control - any backend with a valid signature can technically post, but we verify the signer payload in logic (or rely on valid signatures in future extensions). For this immutable version, we simply record what is sent."}},"title":"DecisionLogger","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getDecision(bytes32)":{"notice":"Fetch decision details."},"logDecision(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,bytes32,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Log a new AI decision."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/DecisionLogger.sol":"DecisionLogger"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/DecisionLogger.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe9ee86c5fcd18c2f9e4df29817a01379cec0aa34894912fc44a81b74c363e062","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4ce9181f086951212e0bd555aa548e0054f36152dbc478854db7233d1fa1e6e2","dweb:/ipfs/QmXK1PAtFzKRsUK6GMgod5wXL1p4WoUjbzXGVqifr5KwEq"]}},"version":1}
